Filipino(fil): Mag-U-turn pakaliwa. Manatili sa pinaka-kaliwang lane at dahan-dahang lapitan ang u-turn slot. 'Wag kalimutang mag signal at mag-head check bago lumiko.
English(en): Make a left u-turn. Remember to stay in the leftmost lane and slow done upon approaching the u-turn. Use your signals and perform a head check before turning.

Filipino(fil): Nagyon, mag-U-turn pakanan sa susunod na junction. Tandaang mag-signal at head check bago lumiko!
English(en): Next, perform a Right U-turn on the next junction. Remember to use your blinkers and to perform a head check before turning!

Filipino(fil): Gamitin mo ang Blinker para i-signal ang liko!
I-signal ang kagustuhang lumiko 25m palang ang layo sa lilikuan.
English(en): You should already signal your intent to turn 25m away from the turn.

Filipino(fil): Nalampasan mo na ang U-turn Slot.
Tandaan na dahan-dahan lapitan ang U-turn slot.
English(en): Remember to gradually slow down when approaching a U-turn.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Pula pa ang traffic light! Tumigil at maghintay muna sa likod ng stop line (puti).
English(en): Oops! You entered the intersection while the traffic light was on red. Make sure to stop right before the stop line (white)

Filipino(fil): Maganda yung pag-U-turn mo sa kaliwa, pero dapat nanatili ka sa inner lane.
English(en): Left U-Turn Ok, but stay on inner lane (e.g. vehicles turning right)

Filipino(fil): Bago kumanan, manatili lang sa kanang lane.
English(en): When turning right, position your vehicle on the right lane in advance

Filipino(fil): Maganda yung pag-U-turn mo sa kaliwa, pero dapat nanatili ka sa inner lane.
English(en): U-Turn Ok, but stay on inner lane

Filipino(fil): Bago kumaliwa, manatili lang sa kaliwang lane.
English(en): When turning left, position your vehicle on the left lane in advance

Filipino(fil): Maganda yung pagliko mo sa kanan, pero dapat nanatili ka sa inner lane.
English(en): Right Turn Ok, but stay on inner lane to minimize risk of crashes (e.g. vehicles turning left)

Filipino(fil): Maganda yung pag-U-turn mo, pero dapat nanatili ka sa inner lane.
English(en): U-Turn Ok, but stay on inner lane

Filipino(fil): Maganda yung pag-U-turn mo sa kanan, pero dapat nanatili ka sa inner lane.
English(en): Right U-Turn Ok, but stay on inner lane to minimize risk of crashes (e.g. vehicles turning left)
